item.title: This new ‘Magnificent Seven’ kicks out two favorites — and adds these turbocharged tech stocks
item.description: One fund manager says to ditch Tesla and Apple and buy Oracle and Broadcom. Here’s why.

item.title: Stellantis gets a downgrade. Its rebound may never come, analyst warns.

item.title: Chime Financial’s stock can rise a lot more even after its hot IPO, this analyst says

item.title: My life partner is 18 years my senior. He wants to leave his $4.5 million fortune to me — not his two kids. Do we tell them?
item.description: “No doubt they would feel the arrangement is unfair, and that would potentially end our relationship.”

item.title: I put my $500K inheritance into a joint account with my husband. Can I leave half of it to my son from a previous marriage?
item.description: “If I predecease my husband, my will states that my son will receive half of this account.”
